name: Brandon Drake
text:
Avan is a genuine, trustworthy, and growth-minded professional who is always learning and developing his business and technical skills. He's always ready to provide his help when people ask questions, especially technology- type questions. Over the past few months, we've developed a rapport because of his willingness to bounce ideas off each other so we can both thrive. He's helped me integrate the social media component of Quonnect Al.

Even though it took me months to finally realize how important it was, his professionalism remained the same. He continually provided value and advice whenever I asked, which is a sign of true professionalism.

Also as a user of the Quonnect Al Social Platform, I can clearly say with 100% confidence that I love this platform. Being able to schedule my social media posts out into the future to multiple social media platforms is such a huge time saver. If you're looking for something to streamline your business not just in social media but with an affordable and efficient CRMI highly suggest you talk to Avan first as he is a CRM guru in my opinion. You can even talk to me and ask me questions and I will 100% give him high marks all around!

name: Jay Handler
text:
Forget the FACT that Quonnect Al is the BEST CRM OUT THERE... Avan truly cares about his clients' success and he doesn't just 'talk the talk'...he takes action every day to prove it.

I've been burned before (over and over again)...so I don't recommend folks easily...but I 100% endorse Avan and Quonnect for any business looking to scale to the next level.

name: Lee Rosenblum
text:
Courtney at Quonnect Ai Team is extremely knowledgeable and experienced in sales, advertising, and marketing. He has worked in these fields for over 20 years and is passionate about sharing his knowledge and experience with other professionals and businesses.

His goal is to help others benefit from his expertise so that they may grow and succeed in their own careers. Courtney is always friendly and willing to help, and I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for guidance in these areas.

text: Quonnect AI has a great platform for managing my business and my contacts.

text: I can't recommend Quonnect AI team enough!

text: Faizan has created a great product. Everything you need to manage your business is all right in one place to help you get and stay organized. That means using less time and energy working on your job and more time getting to enjoy the fruits of your labors.

name: Marc Mathys
text: Amazing Service and Amazing people

text: The process to switch my CRM was seamless. Great customer support and resources.

name: Morry Zelcovitch
text:
My experience with Mariam over the time that I have known him at his company has been excellent, professional and efficient. Between his texting technology, his ability to create and maintain marketing solutions which can include landing pages forms and lead capture not to mention professional website creation that is simplified and can be applied to almost any business, his work is second to none.

He takes the headaches away with seamless automation and complete systems to do the important work that you need to do but often don't want to do yourself I highly recommend Quonnect/Mariam for anyone looking to get to the next level and Beyond.

name: Clark Keller
text: Courtney is very knowledgeable and very willing to share. I would recommend him and Quonnect Al team to anybody that is in need of a robust CRM.

text: Courtney is just an all-around great person. In terms of business, he is not just a great customer service person; but he knows his clients and helps you build a successful business.

name: CATHY WEAVER
text:
If social media is not your strength ... yet ... and if marketing and artificial intelligence are not at the top of your skillset ... yet ... then it's time to enlist the talents of Avan. Have you reached the Quonnect of your career yet?

Avan may be the person to walk with you to get that Success journey where you have always wanted it to be !!! Connect with Avan and Quonnect Al and find out what your strategic plan could look like !!! Do not delay ... reach out today !!!

name: Marc Mathys
text: great knowledge about Digital Marketing and your CRM

text: Courtney/Quonnect AI team is brilliant when it comes to CRM platforms. His help not just in technical support but also in guiding us in our marketing strategy has been paramount to our success.

name: Jay Turner
text: Terrific marketing automation professional. An asset to his community. Keep up the great work, Faizan!

name: Brian Kubacki
text: Mariam has a ton of experience and expertise and can effectively help you find a solution to your problem.

name: Angelique Stidhum
text:
In just a few days, Avan has shown a kind of care and attention to detail I didn't know still existed. My mind is completely BLOWN.

His marketing platform, Quonnect AI team, should have a Netflix series so us professional marketers can swoon over the functions & features with snacks, rewind and whisper back words like 'ringless voicemails'... 'integrated socials' 'the first TRUE CRM' ... and 'fully automated funnels'. No Zapier, it's all there, it's a unicorn, it's magical and it's the best kept secret in true marketing automation.

He knows his stuff, and any professional marketer should run, not walk to jump on a call to see it.

I'm so grateful for the time he took in helping me soar. He disassembled a multitude of obstacles in a single phone call and armed us with tools we've needed to take us to the next level.

His solutions made my current system look like I made it with crayons, construction paper and glued pasta.

He's a professional problem solver, a true marketing athlete and I've just elected myself as his cheerleader.

name: Nicholas (Nick) Davis
text: Faizan is amazing! Not only does he offer MINDBLOWING solutions for things I didn't even know I needed, but he's incredibly personable and his software can save me TONS of hours!!

name: Renee Reisch
text: I highly recommend Quonnect Ai team! If you are ready to take your business to the next level, look no further. Quonnect Ai is the place to go and Avan is the man to take you there! I had the privilege of working with him and would HIGHLY recommend you do the same. Thank you Avan, for your continued support! Much gratitude and appreciation!
